# Spheron Provider

Spheron terraform provider.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    spheron = {
      version = "1.0.0"
      source  = "spheron/spheron"
    }
  }
}

provider "spheron" {
  # token = ""
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `token` (String) Spheron access token. If left empty provide SPHERON_TOKEN env variable.
